name: Rainbow Runner Free
description:
Ever dreamed of running on the rainbow? Now you can with this physics based slide and fly game.

Help our friend Leprechaun to collect as many coins as possible before he run out of energy.

Slide down the rainbow and release before valley to making him fly. Repeat this to make him fly higher.

Collect power up energy balls to him fly even higher.

The more coins you collect and faster you clear levels, the more stars you get.

***** FEATURES *****
- 56 challenging levels in 7 different magical worlds
- Magic bottles for great energy boots to fly higher
- Game Center Leaderboards
- Game Center Achievements
- Optimized for iPhone 5
